trans-unit.source: Iterates through a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 循环访问 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic and C# each contain a statement that hides the complexity of the enumerators (`foreach` in C# and `For Each` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 和 C# 每个包含的语句的隐藏了枚举数的复杂性 (`foreach`在 C# 和`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Use the appropriate statement for the language you are using, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator.
trans-unit.target: 为正在使用，而不直接操作枚举数的语言中使用的适当语句。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Reset%2A> method also brings the enumerator back to this position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Reset%2A>方法还会枚举器放回此位置。

trans-unit.source: At this position, setting the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Current%2A> property throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 在此位置上，设置<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Current%2A>属性引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，必须调用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>方法将枚举数前移到集合，然后再读取的值的第一个元素<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Current%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Current%2A> returns the same object until either <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 在调用 <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Current%2A> 或 <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> 之前，<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Reset%2A> 返回同一对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> sets <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Current%2A> to the next element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> 将 <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Current%2A> 设置为下一个元素。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>越过的末尾的集合，枚举数定位在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> also return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 当枚举器位于此位置上，后续调用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>还返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: If the last call to <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, calling <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果最后一次调用到<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>返回`false`，则调用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Current%2A>引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To set <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Current%2A> to the first element of the collection again, you can call <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Reset%2A> followed by <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要再次将 <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Current%2A> 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Reset%2A> 并接着调用 <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Reset%2A> throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果对集合进行更改，例如添加、 修改或删除元素，则枚举数将失效且不可恢复失效，并且下次调用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>或<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Reset%2A>引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: If the collection is modified between <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Current%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Current%2A> returns the element that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated.
trans-unit.target: 如果之间修改集合<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Current%2A>，<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Current%2A>返回到，设置的元素，即使枚举数已经无效。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem" /> at the current position of the enumerator.
trans-unit.target: 获取枚举数当前位置的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem" /> at the current position of the enumerator.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem" />位于枚举数当前位置。

trans-unit.source: After an enumerator is created or after the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Reset%2A> method is called, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> method must be called to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Current%2A>; otherwise, <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Current%2A> is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个枚举器或<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Reset%2A>调用方法时，<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>必须调用方法来枚举器向前移动到集合，然后再读取的值的第一个元素<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Current%2A>; 否则为<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Current%2A>是未定义。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Current%2A> also throws an exception if the last call to <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, which indicates the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Current%2A> 如果最后一次调用到也会引发异常<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>返回`false`，指示集合的末尾。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Current%2A> does not move the position of the enumerator, and consecutive calls to <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Current%2A> return the same object until either <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Current%2A> 不会移动的位置的枚举器，并对连续调用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Current%2A>之前返回同一对象<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>或<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Reset%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Reset%2A> throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果对集合进行更改，例如添加、 修改或删除元素，则枚举数将失效且不可恢复失效，并且下次调用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>或<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Reset%2A>引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: If the collection is modified between <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Current%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Current%2A> returns the element that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated.
trans-unit.target: 如果之间修改集合<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Current%2A>，<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Current%2A>返回到，设置的元素，即使枚举数已经无效。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator is positioned before the first element of the collection or after the last element.
trans-unit.target: 枚举器位于集合中第一个元素之前或最后一个元素之后。

trans-unit.source: Advances the enumerator to the next <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem" /> in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 将枚举数推进到 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemCollection" /> 中的下一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem" />; <see langword="false" /> if the enumerator has passed the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果枚举数成功地推进到下一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果枚举数越过集合的结尾，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: After an enumerator is created or after <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called, an enumerator is positioned before the first element of the collection, and the first call to <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> moves the enumerator to the first element of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个枚举器或<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Reset%2A>是调用，枚举数定位在集合中，并且首次调用的第一个元素之前<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>移动到的集合的第一个元素的枚举数。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>越过的末尾的集合，枚举数定位在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> also return `false` until <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 当枚举器位于此位置上，后续调用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>还返回`false`直到<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Reset%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Reset%2A> throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果对集合进行更改，例如添加、 修改或删除元素，则枚举数将失效且不可恢复失效，并且下次调用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>或<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Reset%2A>引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: The collection was modified after the enumerator was created.
trans-unit.target: 集合在枚举器创建后被修改。

trans-unit.source: Sets the enumerator to its initial position, which is before the first <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem" /> in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将枚举数设置为其初始位置，该位置位于集合中第一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItem" /> 之前。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Reset%2A> throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果对集合进行更改，例如添加、 修改或删除元素，则枚举数将失效且不可恢复失效，并且下次调用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>或<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.Reset%2A>引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: The collection was modified after the enumerator was created.
trans-unit.target: 集合在枚举器创建后被修改。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator" /> 使用的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator>.
trans-unit.target: 在完成使用 <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A> 后，应调用 <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A> 方法使 <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator> 处于不可用状态。

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在调用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A>，必须释放对所有引用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator>以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator>占用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a17b0066-71c2-4ba4-9822-8e19332fc213) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eb4e1af0-3b48-4fbc-ad4e-fc2f64138bf9).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a17b0066-71c2-4ba4-9822-8e19332fc213)和[实现 Dispose 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eb4e1af0-3b48-4fbc-ad4e-fc2f64138bf9)。

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator>.
trans-unit.target: 每次释放对 <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator.System%23IDisposable%23Dispose%2A> 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator> 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。

trans-unit.source: This method is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator> instance is cast to an <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Applications.CachedDataItemEnumerator> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.IDisposable> 接口时使用。
